statements: SELECT * FROM DiseaseOutbreaks ORDER BY outbreak_id DESC;
SELECT disease_name, total_cases FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE affected_region = 'Asia';
SELECT outbreak_id, disease_name, total_cases, recovery_rate FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE total_cases > 100 ORDER BY total_cases ASC;
SELECT * FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE recovery_rate < 0.8;
SELECT disease_name, affected_region FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE total_cases BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT outbreak_id, disease_name, affected_region, total_cases, recovery_rate FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE total_cases > 100 ORDER BY total_cases DESC
SELECT disease_name, COUNT(*) AS num_outbreaks FROM DiseaseOutbreaks GROUP BY disease_name HAVING num_outbreaks > 1 ORDER BY num_outbreaks DESC
SELECT AVG(total_cases) AS avg_cases, AVG(recovery_rate) AS avg_recovery_rate FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE recovery_rate > 0.5
SELECT outbreak_id, disease_name, affected_region FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE affected_region = 'Asia' AND total_cases BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY outbreak_id
SELECT * FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE total_cases > 300 AND recovery_rate < 0.3 ORDER BY outbreak_id ASC
SELECT * FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT outbreak_name, outbreak_date FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE outbreak_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT outbreak_id, response_efforts FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE outbreak_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT region_name, region_population FROM Regions WHERE region_population > 1000000;
SELECT outbreak_id, outbreak_name, response_efforts FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE region_id = 2;
SELECT outbreak_id, region_id, outbreak_name FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE region_id = 1 ORDER BY outbreak_date DESC
SELECT outbreak_id, outbreak_name, response_efforts FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE outbreak_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY outbreak_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE region_id = 2 AND outbreak_name LIKE '%flu%'
SELECT region_name, region_population FROM Regions WHERE region_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY region_population DESC
SELECT outbreak_name, outbreak_date, response_efforts FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE region_id = 4 ORDER BY outbreak_date DESC, outbreak_name ASC
SELECT * FROM disease_outbreaks ORDER BY outbreak_date DESC;
SELECT region_name, disease_name, number_of_cases FROM disease_outbreaks WHERE region_name = 'Asia';
SELECT outbreak_id, response_date, response_description FROM response_efforts WHERE organization_name = 'Red Cross';
SELECT region_name, country FROM regions WHERE region_population >= 1000000;
SELECT outbreak_id, region_name, number_of_cases FROM disease_outbreaks JOIN regions ON disease_outbreaks.region_name = regions.region_name;
SELECT outbreak_id, region_name, disease_name, number_of_cases, outbreak_date FROM disease_outbreaks WHERE number_of_cases > 100 ORDER BY outbreak_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM disease_outbreaks WHERE region_name = 'North America' AND disease_name LIKE '%Flu%' ORDER BY number_of_cases DESC;

SELECT response_id, response_date, organization_name, response_description FROM response_efforts WHERE organization_name = 'Red Cross' OR organization_name = 'Doctors Without Borders' ORDER BY response_date;
SELECT region_name, country, region_population FROM regions WHERE region_population > 1000000 ORDER BY region_population DESC;
SELECT outbreak_id, region_name, disease_name, number_of_cases, outbreak_date FROM disease_outbreaks WHERE outbreak_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY number_of_cases DESC;
SELECT * FROM Regions;
SELECT region_id, region_name FROM Regions ORDER BY region_id DESC;
SELECT disease_name FROM Diseases WHERE disease_id = 2;
SELECT outbreak_id, outbreak_date FROM Outbreaks WHERE region_id = 5 ORDER BY outbreak_date ASC;
SELECT response_id, response_date, response_description FROM ResponseEfforts WHERE response_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Regions;
SELECT region_name FROM Regions ORDER BY region_id DESC;
SELECT disease_name, region_name FROM Diseases JOIN Outbreaks ON Diseases.disease_id = Outbreaks.disease_id JOIN Regions ON Outbreaks.region_id = Regions.region_id;
SELECT * FROM Outbreaks WHERE outbreak_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT disease_name, COUNT(outbreak_id) AS outbreak_count FROM Diseases JOIN Outbreaks ON Diseases.disease_id = Outbreaks.disease_id GROUP BY disease_name ORDER BY outbreak_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM outbreaks;
SELECT outbreak_name, region FROM outbreaks WHERE region='Asia';
SELECT response_type, response_date FROM responses ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT personnel_name, region_name FROM personnel INNER JOIN regions ON personnel.region_id = regions.region_id;
SELECT outbreak_name, start_date, end_date FROM outbreaks WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM outbreaks WHERE region='Europe' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, status FROM cases WHERE status='active' AND region='Asia';
SELECT personnel_name, regions.region_name FROM personnel JOIN regions ON personnel.region_id = regions.region_id;
SELECT outbreak_name, region, start_date FROM outbreaks WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT response_type, COUNT(response_id) AS total_responses FROM responses GROUP BY response_type ORDER BY total_responses DESC;
